query:
ALTER TABLE workflows 
ADD COLUMN workspaceId INT NULL AFTER userId,
ADD COLUMN triggerType ENUM('time', 'event', 'webhook', 'manual') DEFAULT 'manual' AFTER edges,
ADD COLUMN triggerConfig JSON NULL AFTER triggerType,
ADD COLUMN enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE AFTER status,
ADD COLUMN lastRunAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER enabled,
ADD COLUMN lastRunStatus ENUM('success', 'error', 'running') NULL AFTER lastRunAt;
